lead_paragraph: Recent articles in this newspaper have raised the difficult problem of the readjustment in this country and Great Britain of hugely expanded aviation to a peacetime economy. In America an industry which produced only 3,715 airplanes in 1939 steadily moves toward a production figure of 85,000 or more per annum.
abstract: ed on US and Brit problems
